entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Matane

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 60%
